languageKey.label: Attributes for the type "Selectorbox"
sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,sav_library_kickstarter_general:*

It associates a function with the selectorbox items. The parameter function_name can be: . makeItemLink . makeExtLink . makeLink . makeUrlLink . makeEmailLink See functions for the associated parameters.
It can be used with selector boxes associated with a MM relation to replace the default < br /> separator between items in showAll or showSingle views.
